entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets late this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 late this morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
